content: this scarf is great for a number of reasons it s soft and cozy the pattern looks great in any yarn solid striped and varigated it s quick to make and it only uses one skein cowl if you love the half_double_crochet stitch and crochet that looks knitted then this is the perfect project for you > **buy 2 patterns get 1 free using code freepattern ** crochet skill level easy/beginner language english crochet terminology us terms > video tutorial 1 showing how to do the stitch technique 2 patterns in 1 crochet cowl + infinity scarf pattern yarn i love this yarn gradient - brights alternative yarn options any medium 4 worsted/aran weight yarn can be used as a substitute approximately 196 yds needed for the cowl and 392 yds needed for the infinity scarf finished dimensions > cowl lying flat 6 x 12 75 > infinity scarf lying flat 6 x 28 please note that this is a beautifully formatted and concise pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on my blog **to view the free version click * here 2 * ** other details * this pattern includes instructions for making a cowl a tight fitting circular piece or an infinity scarf a loose fitting circular piece that can be looped around your neck 2 - 3 times * make it in any size - instructions are provided to customize the size of each cowl and infinity scarf * total of 7 pages including the cover page 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=ngdsbrltd7o 2 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-knit-like-cowl-and-infinity-scarf/
